chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
GoOutSunday: Prop
Married: Prop
WearKilt: Prop
RedSocks: Prop
Scottish: Prop
rule1: ~ Scottish -> RedSocks
rule2: WearKilt \/ ~ RedSocks
rule3: Married -> ~ GoOutSunday
rule4: GoOutSunday <-> Scottish
rule5: WearKilt -> Scottish /\ Married
rule6: Scottish -> WearKilt

Goal:
False

Premises:
Tauto.eval_f_morph : forall (ex : ?TX -> Prop) (ev ev' : ?TA -> Prop) (f : Tauto.GFormula), (forall a : ?TA, ev a <-> ev' a) -> Tauto.eval_f ex ev f < -> Tauto.eval_f ex ev' f where ?TA : [Scottish : Prop RedSocks : Prop WearKilt : Prop Married : Prop GoOutSunday : Prop rule1 : ~ Scottish -> RedSocks rule2 : WearKilt \/ ~ RedSocks rule3 : Married -> ~ GoOutSunday rule4 : GoOutSunday < -> Scottish rule5 : WearKilt -> Scottish /\ Married rule6 : Scottish -> WearKilt |- Type] ?TX : [Scottish : Prop RedSocks : Prop WearKilt : Prop Married : Prop GoOutSunday : Prop rule1 : ~ Scottish -> RedSocks rule2 : WearKilt \/ ~ RedSocks rule3 : Married -> ~ GoOutSunday rule4 : GoOutSunday < -> Scottish rule5 : WearKilt -> Scottish /\ Married rule6 : Scottish ->...-> WearKilt |- Type]
Tauto.GFormula_ind : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Prop, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall (o : option ?AF) (g0 : Tauto.GFormula), P g0 -> P (Tauto.I g o g0)) ->...-> WearKilt |- Type]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 where ?A : [Scottish : Prop RedSocks : Prop WearKilt : Prop Married : Prop GoOutSunday : Prop rule1 : ~ Scottish -> RedSocks rule2 : WearKilt \/ ~ RedSocks rule3 : Married -> ~ GoOutSunday rule4 : GoOutSunday < -> Scottish rule5 : WearKilt -> Scottish /\ Married rule6 : Scottish ->...-> WearKilt |- Type]
Decidable.not_iff : forall A B : Prop, Decidable.decidable A -> Decidable.decidable B -> ~ (A <-> B) -> A /\ ~ B \/ ~ A /\ B
Refl.not_make_conj_cons : forall (A : Type) (t : A) (a : list A) (eval : A -> Prop), eval t \/ ~ eval t -> ~ Refl.make_conj eval (t :: a) < -> ~ eval t \/ ~ Refl.make_conj eval a
Refl.not_make_conj_app : forall (A : Type) (t a : list A) (eval : A -> Prop), (forall d : A, eval d \/ ~ eval d) -> ~ Refl.make_conj eval (t ++ a) < -> ~ Refl.make_conj eval t \/ ~ Refl.make_conj eval a
Decidable.decidable = fun P : Prop => P \/ ~ P : Prop -> Prop Arguments Decidable.decidable _%type_scope
List.Exists_Forall_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, P x \/ ~ P x) -> List.Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l < -> ~ List.Forall P l
ssreflect.iffRLn : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> ~ Q -> ~ P
ssreflect.iffLRn : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> ~ P -> ~ Q
OrderedRing.Rtimes_neq_0 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, ~ req n rO /\ ~ req m rO -> ~ req (rtimes n m) rO
Tauto.eval_f = fun (TA TX AA AF : Type) (ex : TX -> Prop) (ea : TA -> Prop) => fix eval_f (f : Tauto.GFormula) : Prop := match f with | Tauto.TT => True | Tauto.FF => False | Tauto.X p => ex p | Tauto.A a _ => ea a | Tauto.Cj e1 e2 => eval_f e1 /\ eval_f e2 | Tauto.D e1 e2 => eval_f e1 \/ eval_f e2 | Tauto.N e => ~ eval_f e | Tauto.I f1 _ f2 => eval_f f1 -> eval_f f2 end : forall TA TX AA AF : Type, (TX -> Prop) -> (TA -> Prop) -> Tauto.GFormula -> Prop Arguments Tauto.eval_f {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
ZifyClasses.uop_iff : forall p1 q1 : Prop, p1 < -> q1 -> ~ p1 < -> ~ q1
OrderedRing.SORlt_le_neq : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, rlt n m < -> rle n m /\ ~ req n m
OrderedRing.Rlt_le_neq : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, rlt n m < -> rle n m /\ ~ req n m
OrderedRing.Req_dne : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, ~ ~ req n m < -> req n m
OrderedRing.Req_em : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, req n m \/ ~ req n m
OrderedRing.mk_SOR_theory : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> (forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rplus x1 y1) (rplus x2 y2)) -> (forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rtimes x1 y1) (rtimes x2 y2)) -> (forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> req (ropp x1) (ropp x2)) ->...-> OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt
Field_theory.ropp_neq_0 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall r : R, ~ req (ropp rI) rO -> ~ req r rO -> ~ req (ropp r) rO
ssrbool.impliesPn : forall P Q : Prop, ssrbool.implies P Q -> ~ Q -> ~ P
Field_theory.field_is_integral_domain : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall r1 r2 : R, ~ req r1 rO -> ~ req r2 rO -> ~ req (rmul r1 r2) rO
Between.between_not_exists : forall (P Q : nat -> Prop) (k l : nat), Between.between P k l -> (forall n : nat, Between.in_int k l n -> P n -> ~ Q n) -> ~ Between.exists_between Q k l
ZifyClasses.mkprop : forall Op : Prop -> Prop -> Prop, (forall p1 p2 q1 q2 : Prop, p1 <-> q1 -> p2 <-> q2 -> Op p1 p2 <-> Op q1 q2) -> ZifyClasses.PropOp Op
OrderedRing.Rneq_symm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, ~ req n m -> ~ req m n
Field_theory.rinv_nz : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall a : R, ~ req a rO -> ~ req (rinv a) rO
decide_right : forall (C : Prop) (decide : {C} + {~ C}), ~ C -> forall P : {C} + {~ C} -> Prop, (forall H : ~ C, P (right H)) -> P decide
Field_theory.pow_pos_nz : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall (x : R) (p : BinNums.positive), ~ req x rO -> ~ req (Ring_theory.pow_pos rmul x p) rO
Record SOR (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_SOR_theory { SORsetoid : Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req; SORplus_wd : forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 ->...-> rlt rO (rtimes n m); SORneq_0_1 : ~ req rO rI } Arguments OrderedRing.SOR [R]%type_scope _ _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments OrderedRing.mk_SOR_theory [R]%type_scope [rO rI] [rplus rtimes rminus ropp req]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope _ (_ _ _ _ _)%function_scope _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
Field_theory.mk_sfield : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.semi_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul req -> ~ req rI rO -> (forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q))) -> (forall p : R, ~ req p rO -> req (rmul (rinv p) p) rI) -> Field_theory.semi_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rdiv rinv req
OrderedRing.Rlt_nge : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, rlt n m < -> ~ rle m n
OrderedRing.Rle_ngt : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, rle n m < -> ~ rlt m n
absurd_set : forall (A : Prop) (C : Set), A -> ~ A -> C
Field_theory.mk_afield : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> ~ req rI rO -> (forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q))) -> (forall p : R, ~ req p rO -> req (rmul (rinv p) p) rI) -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req
Field_theory.mk_field : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> ~ req rI rO -> (forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q))) -> (forall p : R, ~ req p rO -> req (rmul (rinv p) p) rI) -> Field_theory.field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req
List.neg_Forall_Exists_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> ~ List.Forall P l -> List.Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l
Field_theory.gen_phiPOS_discr_sgn : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> (forall p : BinNums.positive, ~ req (InitialRing.gen_phiPOS1 rI radd rmul p) rO) -> forall x y : BinNums.positive, ~ req (InitialRing.gen_phiPOS rI radd rmul x) (ropp (InitialRing.gen_phiPOS rI radd rmul y))
Record PropOp (Op : Prop -> Prop -> Prop) : Prop := mkprop { op_iff : forall p1 p2 q1 q2 : Prop, p1 < -> q1 -> p2 < -> q2 -> Op p1 p2 < -> Op q1 q2 } PropOp has primitive projections with eta conversion. Arguments ZifyClasses.PropOp _%function_scope Arguments ZifyClasses.mkprop (_ _)%function_scope
Record almost_field_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_afield { AF_AR : Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req; AF_1_neq_0 : ~ req rI rO; AFdiv_def : forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q)); AFinv_l : forall p : R, ~ req p rO -> req (rmul (rinv p) p) rI } Arguments Field_theory.almost_field_theory [R]%type_scope _ _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments Field_theory.mk_afield [R]%type_scope [rO rI] [radd rmul rsub ropp]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [req]%function_scope _ _ (_ _)%function_scope
Record field_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_field { F_R : Ring_theory.ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req; F_1_neq_0 : ~ req rI rO; Fdiv_def : forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q)); Finv_l : forall p : R, ~ req p rO -> req (rmul (rinv p) p) rI } Arguments Field_theory.field_theory [R]%type_scope _ _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments Field_theory.mk_field [R]%type_scope [rO rI] [radd rmul rsub ropp]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [req]%function_scope _ _ (_ _)%function_scope
Field_theory.SF_1_neq_0 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Field_theory.semi_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rdiv rinv req -> ~ req rI rO

```coq
intros.
unfold GoOutSunday in rule4.
unfold rule4 in rule3.
unfold Scottish in rule5.
unfold Scottish in rule6.
apply (ssreflect.iffRLn _ _ rule4) in rule5.
apply (ssreflect.iffRLn _ _ rule5) in rule6.
apply (ssreflect.iffRLn _ _ rule6) in rule2.
apply (ssreflect.iffRLn _ _ rule5) in rule1.
apply (Field_theory.SF_1_neq_0 with (radd:=WearKilt) (rdiv:=~ RedSocks)) in rule2.
apply (Field_theory.SF_1_neq_0 with (radd:=~ Scottish) (rdiv:=RedSocks)) in rule1.
apply (Field_theory.SF_1_neq_0 with (radd:=~ Scottish) (rdiv:=RedSocks)) in rule1.
apply (absurd_set _ _ rule2) in rule1.
exact rule1.
Qed.
```

original: intros. unfold GoOutSunday in rule4. unfold rule4 in rule3. unfold Scottish in rule5. unfold Scottish in rule6. apply (ssreflect.iffRLn _ _ rule4) in rule5. apply (ssreflect.iffRLn _ _ rule5) in rule6. apply (ssreflect.iffRLn _ _ rule6) in rule2. apply (ssreflect.iffRLn _ _ rule5) in rule1.
